body:
Hey guys, for about 1 year 3 months I have been compiling best times for maps on Avicus into a document on my desktop. I am making this post so people can refer to the list of best times and records if curious, but also for people to post new records they have achieved on maps. To put your time on the list please follow the guideline of; screenshot of map time (displayed on tab), type names of people who got the objectives (if someone gets more than one objective write x2 for example), type the name of the map and previous record. If valid I will then edit the post and add it to the list :) I do not have screenshots for the times I have currently collected as there are so many, although you will have to trust me that all these times are correct- and I would have no reason to lie anyway. Also, some of the IGNs on the list are likely to be outdated as this list has been compiled over a long period of time. Enjoy the list and feel free to ask any questions below :)

List of map records (no particular order):

Honeycomb-55sec Ryiley Lokigh
CherryLandMC-1min 4sec Lokigh TwentyoneNemos
Fissura-32sec Lokigh killerbye22
Formorgar-50sec Dereban rolinol
Crusade-1min 14sec Lokigh
Abandoned Park I-1min 35sec Lokigh x2 dyah Fauin
Rendezvous II-3min 38sec NotJoules x2 MeMyselfAndGhost 
Castle Adventure-1min 50sec Mr_Mazza NotJoules
Dust Devils-46sec Speeded(Dereban)
Bleened Rings-1min 34sec Lokigh x2 Mr_Mazza
Justice I-1min 26sec Dyah Lokigh
Rigor Mortis-1min 9sec Merp
Ternio-2min 17sec Lokigh Third_Eye03 SlimeyFxsh
Senex I-1min 17sec Lokigh SuperLasuz
Luar-58sec Merp Nathy
Teres-1min 34sec Lokigh Ryiley MarcuzFireZ
Sandstorm-55sec Wazzah MarcuzFireZ
Venomous-55sec Merp Eteh (Unknown)
Rendezvous I-47sec Lokigh MarcuzFireZ
Ravanged-1min 43sec Lokigh Dyah
Senex II-1min 16sec Lokigh x2
Clay Wars-51sec Lokigh pierrotwinner
Halcyon-47sec pierrotwinner seacat1906
Campi Erbosi-1min 4sec Lokigh Ryiley
Quintus-1min 29sec Lokigh x2 Aviia x3
Tasty Fight-1min 2sec KevinToys ziqyx
Atlantis- 1min 5sec Lokigh x2
Mute City II-1min 21sec Peniquin salchixa
Tallon Overworld-56sec Lokigh KevinsToys
Castle Adventure-1min 47sec Lokigh Jotrexwitz
Frostbite-2min 5sec Lokigh x3 Bebe1972 x1
Phrendrana Sanctury-1min 20sec Lokigh Aviia
Sunbeam Temple-1min 1sec Lokigh AstroPizza
BerryLandMC DTC-56sec Lokigh
Campi Erbosi 2- 1min 1sec Lokigh Aviia
Port Town 2- 1min 1sec U_U_U_U_U_U_U_U mels159
PonyLands 2- 1min 13sec Aviia
Deadlock- 1min 46sec Lokigh Aviia
Terra CTF- 1min 31sec Aviia nnatile
Sweet Slopes- 3min 11sec Lokigh PeeDubz
Solvite- 1min 48sec Lokigh x2
Rendezvous Redux- 1min 5sec Lokigh Cqctus
E Minor- 1min 17sec Casck
Apache-1min 28sec Lokigh
Starshine Beach-1min 20sec Lokigh x2
Sector Six- 1min 28sec Lokigh x2 minertedtoad
Proleium 1.5- 1min 8sec Vior_ Mariorusher50
Formorgar 2- 1min 26sec Patrikano TiosTy

replies.body: By splitting up the monuments ;)
replies.body_tagged: By splitting up the monuments ;)

reply_to.body: How does one do quintus in 90 seconds
reply_to.body_tagged: How does one do quintus in 90 seconds

replies.body:
So you are able to bridge and break 5 different monuments? ._.

Takes 10 seconds to mine an obsidian monument.
Takes about 8 seconds to ninja bridge from one side to the next.
Takes 7 seconds to ninja bridge from one side to the monument, and about 14 from one to the next.

So, you figure that Aviiia took 30 seconds in breaking monuments, and took 14 + 14 + 8 (a back, mid, front)
Assuming you and Aviia broke it roughly the same time, that means:

It takes about 66 seconds (slight margin of error) to get the monuments and and bridge over the void.
However, that doesn't include navigation. Since it was done in 90 seconds, we're going to do 90 - 66.

90 - 66 = 24 seconds. That is roughly the amount of time spent running on solid blocks in the map.

While a stretch, it may be possible. I just feel like it is implausible given the math for it: you also have to account for enemies, arrows, any mistakes, or whatever else. It just seems too perfect.

replies.body: it is not 10 seconds for obsidian, pretty sure there is efficiency. Also the other players didn't bother shooting so we were able to bridge straight from the start, so pretty much the fastest you can get on that map hence why its the best time I have recorded in the last year and a bit.
